categories: Hike Midweight Merino Comfort Crew Socks
description: All day comfort for hiking, backpacking and roaming trails. The fabric helps manage moisture to keep toes dry and comfortable. Ventilation built into the top of the sock help your feet breathe on rough trails.Made of moisture-wicking Coolmax® polyester, merino wool, nylon and elastane to keep your feet cool.Supportive fit on your foot, with a slightly looser comfort fit around your calf so you can wear the cuffs up or down.Flat toe seam feels smooth in your boots.Cushioning in specific areas to support your foot and leg.Shaped heel cup hugs your feet.Designed to return to original shape after every wash.
name: Bridgedale Hike Midweight Merino Comfort Crew Socks - Unisex
